Bible Studies

Deep dives into Scripture focused on knowing Jesus — the Son of God who invites us to run into His arms.

About These Studies

Running to God is all about relationship — specifically, our relationship with Jesus, the Son of God. These Bible studies are designed to help you:

  • •Understand who Jesus really is according to Scripture
  • •Experience His love, grace, and invitation personally
  • •Learn what it means to follow Him daily
  • •Discover the joy of running TO God, not from Him

Available Studies

Who is Jesus?

Exploring the identity of Jesus through the Gospels. Who did He claim to be? What did He do? Why does it matter?

8 lessonsStart study

Running to the Father

The story of the Prodigal Son and what it teaches us about God's relentless love and welcome.

6 lessonsStart study

Following Jesus

What does it mean to be a disciple? Exploring the call to follow Jesus and what it costs.

10 lessonsStart study

The Grace Journey

Understanding grace — the unearned, undeserved gift that changes everything.

7 lessonsStart study

A note on theology: While Running to God is not officially affiliated with any denomination, our teaching aligns with Seventh-day Adventist theology. We believe in the authority of Scripture, salvation by grace through faith in Jesus, and the soon return of our Lord.

Running to God

A journey of faith through the Australian outback. Discover the road from Perth to Port Lincoln, and learn what it means to run from ourselves and into the loving arms of Jesus.

"Draw near to God, and he will draw near to you." — James 4:8
